name: cause
description: Submit cause of death code(s) for this patient. Send ALL causes of death from ALL available sources. If a patient has the same cause from multiple sources (e.g., 'Myocardial Infarction' from both death certificate and medical record review), send both records as separate entries.
example: Cardiopulmonary arrest, HCV with liver failure, Chronic alcohol abuse, PCP, ESLD, Upper GI Bleed

name: type
description: Code for classifying causes of death. Valid codes: 1=Immediate cause of death, 2=Contributing causes of death, 3=Underlying cause of death, 4=Primary cause of death (equivalent to underlying), 5=Secondary cause of death (equivalent to contributing), 6=NDI+ Record Axis. Leave BLANK if your site does not classify causes of death.

name: source
description: Source of cause of death information. Valid codes: 1=Medical Record Review, 2=Death certificate, 3=NDI+ Entity Axis, 4=NDI+ Record Axis, 5=Provincial Death Index, 6=Other (specify), 9=Unknown. You may submit either the numeric or text value.
example: 1, 2, Medical Record Review, Death certificate, NDI+ Record Axis
